title: Striptease
plot: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

title: Matlock
plot: Ben Matlock is a very expensive criminal defense attorney, who charges one hundred thousand dollars to take a case. Fortunately, he's worth every penny, as he and his associates defend his clients by finding the real killer.

title: All Creatures Great and Small
plot: The trials and misadventures of the staff of a country veterinary office in Yorkshire from the 1930s to the 1950s.

title: Harriet
plot: The extraordinary tale of  Harriet Tubman 's escape from slavery and transformation into one of America's greatest heroes, whose courage, ingenuity, and tenacity freed hundreds of slaves and changed the course of history.

title: The Mist
plot: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

title: 30 Coins
plot: An exiled priest tries to escape his demons while living in a remote village in Spain.

title: Keeping Faith
plot: Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing. As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sanity.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
plot: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

title: Vinland Saga
plot: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

title: Gran Torino
plot: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

title: Adventureland
plot: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.

title: The Outpost
plot: Talon, the lone survivor of the Blackbloods, sets off to track her family's killers, and discovers her supernatural powers, which she must learn to harness.

title: The Last Dance
plot: Charting the rise of the 1990's Chicago Bulls, led by Michael Jordan, one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.

title: Burden of Truth
plot: Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.

title: Warcraft
plot: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

title: 28 Weeks Later
plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.

title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
plot: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaiian vacation in order to deal with the recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know, Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex - and she's bringing along her new boyfriend.

title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
plot: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

title: Do the Right Thing
plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

title: Pokémon
plot: Ash Ketchum, his yellow pet Pikachu, and his human friends explore a world of powerful creatures.

title: The Founder
plot: The story of  Ray Kroc , a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness.

title: Best in Show
plot: A "behind the scenes" look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog-shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.

title: Hollywood
plot: A group of aspiring actors and filmmakers in post-World War II Hollywood try to make it big - no matter the cost.

title: Thirteen
plot: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.

title: The Untouchables
plot: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent  Eliot Ness  sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster  Al Capone  and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

title: The Machinist
plot: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

title: Crossing Jordan
plot: A "sexy, brilliant" Boston medical examiner. Despite a checkered career, Dr. Jordan Cavanaugh goes above and beyond to solve cases.

title: Drishyam
plot: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: Us Again
plot: An elderly couple regain their youth in the rain.

title: Sausage Party
plot: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

title: Darkest Hour
plot: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on  Winston Churchill , who must decide whether to negotiate with  Adolf Hitler , or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

title: The Master
plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader.

title: Ramy
plot: In New Jersey, Ramy, son of Egyptian migrants, begins a spiritual journey, divided between his Muslim community, God, and his friends who see endless possibilities.

title: I Am Not Okay with This
plot: Sydney is a teenage girl navigating the trials and tribulations of high school while dealing with the complexities of her family, her budding sexuality, and mysterious superpowers just beginning to awaken deep within her.

title: As Above, So Below
plot: When a team of explorers ventures into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead.

title: Years and Years
plot: As Britain slowly turns into a dictatorship throughout the years, the lives of a typical busy family from Manchester converge on one crucial night in 2019.

title: Hostel
plot: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

title: Blue Velvet
plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

title: Cashback
plot: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

title: Nip/Tuck
plot: The dark and twisted trials of two plastic surgeons.

title: Unfaithful
plot: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

title: Annabelle Comes Home
plot: While babysitting the daughter of Ed and Lorraine Warren, a teenager and her friend unknowingly awaken an evil spirit trapped in a doll.

title: Honour
plot: Follows the police investigation and the revelations about police failings in the run-up to the 'honour killing' of Banaz Mahmod, a 20-year-old Iraqi Kurdish woman who was murdered on the orders of her family after she left an abusive marriage for another man.

title: Devious Maids
plot: Four Latina maids with ambition and dreams of their own work for the rich and famous in Beverly Hills.

title: Jungle Cruise
plot: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles but with a supernatural element.

title: The Aviator
plot: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator  Howard Hughes ' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

title: Mortal Kombat: Legacy
plot: The first season of Mortal Kombat: Legacy is a prequel to the original game, explaining the background stories of several characters from the series and demonstrating their reasons for ...                 See full summary  »

title: The Age of Adaline
plot: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.

title: Death in Holy Orders
plot: Detective Adam Dalgliesh looks into the death of a young ordinand who died under mysterious circumstances.

title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
plot: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

title: Flack
plot: Robyn, an American publicist working for a cutthroat London PR company that represents troubled celebrities, is adept at keeping her clients' lives appearing in perfect order, while her own falls to pieces.

title: Mirage
plot: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

title: The Spy
plot: Based on the life of the Israeli spy, Eli Cohen.

title: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
plot: Holistic detective Dirk Gently investigates cases involving the supernatural.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
plot: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

title: Rambo: Last Blood
plot: Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

title: CHiPs
plot: The adventures of two California Highway Patrol motorcycle officers.

title: The Road Warrior
plot: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

title: Fighting with My Family
plot: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

title: Hard
plot: A recent widow learns her deceased husband was in the porn production business and faces the challenge of saving the company she's inherited.

title: The Young and the Restless
plot: Set in Genoa City, this is the long-running soap that tells the story of the struggle behind the business, and sex-savvy Abbott and Newman clans.

title: Rock of Ages
plot: A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

title: Ma
plot: A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

title: Bowfinger
plot: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

title: Legends of the Fall
plot: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

title: The White Queen
plot: Three different, yet equally relentless women vie for the throne in 15th-century England.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
plot: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Burlesque
plot: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

title: Farscape
plot: Thrown into a distant part of the universe, an Earth astronaut finds himself part of a fugitive alien starship crew.

title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
plot: A crime boss teams up with a cop to track down a serial killer.

title: Sherlock Holmes 3
plot: The plot is unknown at this time.

title: Jathi Ratnalu
plot: The plot revolves around the three prisoners. They get released and plan for a happy life outside. Things take a new turn and bring in a twist. Can they find happiness and love now?

title: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
plot: An extraordinary road to emotional healing opens up for an selfish antisocial children's book writer and a selfless psych ward caretaker when they cross paths.

title: Madagascar
plot: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

title: Magnolia
plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

title: The Powerpuff Girls
plot: Three disillusioned women in their 20s with superpowers who used to fight crime together and now resent having lost their childhood to that are faced with the choice of reuniting now that the world needs them more than ever.

title: The Post
plot: A cover-up spanning four U.S. Presidents pushes the country's first female newspaper publisher and her editor to join an unprecedented battle between press and government.

title: The Frog
plot: Ramin plans a robbery on his childhood classmate Noori who has become a mysterious rich man and that's just a beginning of a brutal journey.

title: Deep Impact
plot: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

title: Barbarella
plot: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

title: Tiny Pretty Things
plot: Follows the world of an elite ballet academy, and charts the rise and fall of young adults who live far from their homes, each standing on the verge of greatness or ruin.

title: Mission: Impossible III
plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

title: Flight
plot: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

title: The Grand Tour
plot: Follow Jeremy, Richard, and James, as they embark on an adventure across the globe, driving new and exciting automobiles from manufacturers all over the world.

title: Bad Moms
plot: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.

title: Hardball
plot: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling, and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
plot: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from a gang of criminal ninjas.

title: Bunk'd
plot: Emma, Ravi, and Zuri Ross head off to a rustic summer camp in Maine, where their parents met as teens. Along with their new friends, love triangle, and the fears of the camp, the trio tries their best to settle into their exciting and challenging new lives at Camp Kikiwaka.

title: Hubie Halloween
plot: Despite his devotion to his hometown of Salem (and its Halloween celebration), Hubie Dubois is a figure of mockery for kids and adults alike. But this year, something is going bump in the night, and it's up to Hubie to save Halloween.

title: Despicable Me
plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

title: Love Life
plot: Anna Kendrick stars in a fresh take on a romantic comedy anthology series about the journey from first love to lasting love.

title: Republic of Doyle
plot: Jake Doyle and his father Malachy run a private investigations agency in St. John's, Newfoundland. Their cases involve them in all sorts of dealings - not all of them on the right side of the law.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

title: Future Man
plot: Josh Futturman, a janitor by day and a gamer by night, is recruited by mysterious visitors to travel through time to prevent the extinction of humanity.

title: Patriot
plot: Follows the complicated life of intelligence officer John Tavner, whose latest assignment - to prevent Iran from going nuclear - requires him to forgo all safety nets and assume a perilous non-official cover.

title: The Glorias
plot: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide.

title: Judy
plot: Legendary performer  Judy Garland  arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.

title: Sleepy Hollow
plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

title: Mary Poppins Returns
plot: A few decades after her original visit, Mary Poppins, the magical nanny, returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

title: The Kissing Booth
plot: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

title: Night Hunter
plot: A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

title: Masters of Sex
plot: Drama about the pioneers of the science of human sexuality whose research touched off the sexual revolution.

title: Battleship
plot: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

title: Enemy of the State
plot: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

title: Cold Skin
plot: A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.

title: Growing Pains
plot: The misadventures of a family with a home business father and a journalist mother.

title: Motherless Brooklyn
plot: In 1950s New York, a lonely private detective afflicted with Tourette's Syndrome ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend.

title: 12 Monkeys
plot: Follows the journey of a time traveler from the post-apocalyptic future who appears in present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will nearly destroy the human race.

title: The Conversation
plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

title: Below Deck Mediterranean
plot: A reality show following the crew of the Ionian Princess, a luxury charter yacht in the Mediterranean.

title: It
plot: In 1960, seven pre-teen outcasts fight an evil demon who poses as a child-killing clown. Thirty years later, they reunite to stop the demon once and for all when it returns to their hometown.

title: Episodes
plot: A couple of British TV producers move to Hollywood to export their most popular series, and find it is not what they expected.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: Only Fools and Horses
plot: Comedy that follows two brothers from London's rough Peckham estate as they wheel and deal through a number of dodgy deals and search for the big score that'll make them millionaires.

title: Below Her Mouth
plot: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

title: East of Eden
plot: Two brothers struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor.

title: Enemy
plot: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

title: Big
plot: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

title: The Circle
plot: A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

title: Okja
plot: A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a fascinating beast named Okja.

title: Outlaw King
plot: A true David vs. Goliath story of how the 14th century Scottish 'Outlaw King' Robert the Bruce used cunning and bravery to defeat the much larger and better equipped occupying English army.

title: Never Back Down
plot: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club and meet a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

title: Why Him?
plot: A holiday gathering threatens to go off the rails when Ned Fleming realizes that his daughter's Silicon Valley millionaire boyfriend is about to pop the question.

title: Jumper
plot: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

title: Black or White
plot: A grieving widower is drawn into a custody battle over his granddaughter, whom he helped raise her entire life.

title: Traces
plot: While attending an online forensic course, young lab assistant discovers that the fictitious case study has a link to her past. With a help of two female professors she works on bringing a killer to justice.

title: Utopia
plot: After a group of people, who meet online, discover a bizarre graphic novel which seems to hold mysterious answers, they find themselves being tracked down by a merciless organization known merely as 'The Network'.

title: Queen & Slim
plot: A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.

title: The Ninth Gate
plot: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

title: Rocky III
plot: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

title: Falling Skies
plot: Survivors of an alien attack on earth gather together to fight for their lives and fight back.

title: Cool Hand Luke
plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

title: Hellboy
plot: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

title: A.P. Bio
plot: A former philosophy professor who takes a job teaching AP biology, uses his students to get back at the people in his life who have wronged him.

title: Gone Baby Gone
plot: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

title: The Cosby Show
plot: The goings-on in the life of a successful African-American family.

title: Thelma & Louise
plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

title: The Babysitter
plot: The events of one evening take an unexpected turn for the worst for a young boy trying to spy on his babysitter.

title: The New Pope
plot: Two Popes. Only one Vatican. A holy war to come.

title: Last Action Hero
plot: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

title: Hoosiers
plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

title: The Tourist
plot: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

title: 17 Again
plot: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

title: Greek
plot: Freshman Rusty Cartwright arrives at college and decides he no longer wants to be the boring geek from high school. He decides to pledge a fraternity. Rusty must learn to handle his new life, and his new relationship with his sister. His sister must decide if she ...                 See full summary  »

title: Marvel Studios: Assembled
plot: Assembled is a comprehensive documentary series that chronicles the creation of Marvel Studios' thrilling new shows and theatrical releases. Assembled is an immersive, and in-depth examination of the next phase of the MCU.

title: Bone Tomahawk
plot: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
plot: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

title: Attack the Block
plot: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
plot: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
plot: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

title: The Hunt for Red October
plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine Captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

title: Mask
plot: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

title: Criminal: UK
plot: A cat-and-mouse drama, which focuses on the intense mental conflict between detectives and suspects. The stories take place within the confines of a police interview suite.

title: Truth Be Told
plot: A true-crime podcaster tries to solve the mystery surrounding a family patriarch's death.

title: The Legend of Tarzan
plot: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

title: The Boy
plot: An American nanny is shocked that her new English family's boy is actually a life-sized doll. After she violates a list of strict rules, disturbing events make her believe that the doll is really alive.

title: Toy Story 3
plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Never Let Me Go
plot: The lives of three friends, from their early school days into young adulthood, when the reality of the world they live in comes knocking.

title: Cold Pursuit
plot: A grieving snowplow driver seeks out revenge against the drug dealers who killed his son.

title: Life in a Year
plot: The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

title: Wrath of Man
plot: The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.

title: Trapped
plot: In a remote town in Iceland, Police desperately try to solve a crime as a powerful storm descends upon the town.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot: The story of  T.E. Lawrence , the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

title: Angels & Demons
plot: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

title: The Skin I Live In
plot: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

title: Family Ties
plot: Chronicles liberal ex-hippies Steven and Elyse Keaton, their conservative son Alex, daughters Mallory and Jennifer, and later, youngest child Andrew.

title: Zoey 101
plot: Zoey Brooks and her brother, Dustin, attend their first day at Pacific Coast Academy, a private boarding school that enrolls girls for the first time in its history.

title: Raising Dion
plot: A widowed single mom discovers that her son has super powers and tries to figure out how to raise him safely and responsibly.

title: McLeod's Daughters
plot: Five women run a cattle station, "Drover's Run", in the outback of South Australia.

title: Days of Our Lives
plot: A chronicle of the lives, loves, trials and tribulations of the citizens of the fictional city of Salem.

title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
plot: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

title: Act Naturally
plot: When two estranged stepsisters inherit their father's nudist colony, getting back to nature has never been so completely unnatural. A FilmBuff Presentation.

title: Before Sunrise
plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: The 4400
plot: As the reappearance of 4,400 missing persons on a single day confounds the global community, federal agents on the case slowly discover the ways in which the victims have been changed.

title: Swamp Thing
plot: Abby Arcane returns home to Marais, Louisiana to investigate a deadly swamp-borne virus, only to discover the dark, terrifying mysteries of the swamp.

title: Reba
plot: Reba McEntire stars as the titular character in this smash sitcom about a single mom of three, navigating life in a Houston suburb.

title: Neighbours
plot: Australian soap opera exploring the lives and relationships of the residents of Ramsay Street in Erinsborough.

title: Demolition Man
plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

title: 127 Hours
plot: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

title: The Florida Project
plot: Set over one summer, the film follows precocious six-year-old Moonee as she courts mischief and adventure with her ragtag playmates and bonds with her rebellious but caring mother, all while living in the shadows of Walt Disney World.

title: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
plot: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

title: Last Chance U
plot: Intense look inside the world of junior college football, chronicling the stories of players and coaches in the classroom and on the field.

title: The Whole Nine Yards
plot: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

title: Dragon Ball Z
plot: After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.

title: Eagle Eye
plot: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
plot: A lawyer defending a wealthy man begins to believe his client is guilty of more than just one crime.

title: Offspring
plot: The story of the impossible loves of 30-something obstetrician Nina Proudman and her fabulously messy family.

title: The Musketeers
plot: Set on the streets of 17th-century Paris, "The Musketeers" gives a contemporary take on the classic story about a group of highly trained soldiers and bodyguards assigned to protect King and country.

title: The Longest Day
plot: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

title: The Dead of Night
plot: Alone and isolated at the family ranch, Tommy and his sister June suddenly find themselves being terrorized and hunted by a pair of nomadic killers.

title: Numb3rs
plot: Working for the F.B.I., a mathematician uses equations to help solve various crimes.

title: Dreamcatcher
plot: The film centers on two estranged sisters who, along with their friends, become entrenched in a 48 hour whirlwind of violence after a traumatic experience at an underground music festival.

title: U.S. Marshals
plot: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

title: The Virgin Suicides
plot: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

title: The Other Woman
plot: After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been betraying. And when yet another love affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B.

title: Good Boys
plot: Three 6th grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying accidentally stolen drugs, being hunted by teenage girls, and trying to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party.

title: The Color Purple
plot: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

title: Peep Show
plot: Mark and Jez are a couple of twenty-something roommates who have nothing in common - except for the fact that their lives are anything but normal. Mayhem ensues as the pair strive to cope with day-to-day life.

title: The Dark Tower
plot: A boy haunted by visions of a dark tower from a parallel reality teams up with the tower's disillusioned guardian to stop an evil warlock known as the Man in Black who plans to use the boy to destroy the tower and open the gates of Hell.

title: Bad Education
plot: The beloved superintendent of New York's Roslyn school district and his staff, friends and relatives become the prime suspects in the unfolding of the single largest public school embezzlement scandal in American history.

title: American Pie Presents: Girls' Rules
plot: It's Senior year at East Great Falls. Annie, Kayla, Michelle, and Stephanie decide to harness their girl power and band together to get what they want their last year of high school.

title: Love Everlasting
plot: Bridger Jenkins, a senior in high school, is an outsider with hidden scars and a lifelong dream to see the ocean. Living in poverty, his mother has done everything in her power to give her ...                 See full summary  »

title: Night of the Kings
plot: A young man is sent to "La Maca", a prison of Ivory Coast in the middle of the forest ruled by its prisoners. With the red moon rising, he is designated by the Boss to be the new "Roman" and must tell a story to the other prisoners.

title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

title: Halloween
plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

title: Shoplifters of the World
plot: 1987. Denver, Co. One crazy night in the life of four friends reeling from the sudden demise of iconic British band The Smiths, while the local airwaves are hijacked at gunpoint by an impassioned Smiths fan.

title: The Italian Job
plot: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

title: A Room with a View
plot: Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.

title: Quicksand
plot: Maja, a student in Stockholm, finds herself on trial for murder after a tragedy at her school. More doubts and suspicions arise when new revelations are made.

title: Battle of the Sexes
plot: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one  Billie Jean King  and ex-champ and serial hustler  Bobby Riggs .

title: Burning
plot: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood, who asks him to look after her cat while she's on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

title: The Yin-Yang Master: Dream of Eternity
plot: Qing Ming, the Yin-Yang Master, took his master's last wish and went to the Captial Tiandu City to attend the heaven ceremony.

title: GoldenEye
plot: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

title: The Equalizer
plot: A retired Intelligence Agent turned private detective helps various threatened clients to equalize the odds.

title: Bordertown
plot: Quirky police detective, in Finland, delves into his mind palace to solve despicable crimes all the while trying to keep his family together. If Sherlock was based in Finland this would be it.

title: Slaxx
plot: When a possessed pair of jeans begins to kill the staff of a trendy clothing store, it is up to Libby, an idealistic young salesclerk, to stop its bloody rampage.

title: Now You See Me 2
plot: The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

title: Disobedience
plot: A woman returns to her Orthodox Jewish community that shunned her for her attraction to a female childhood friend. Once back, their passions reignite as they explore the boundaries of faith and sexuality.

title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
plot: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

title: Ghost
plot: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

title: Old School
plot: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

title: National Treasure
plot: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

title: Power Book II: Ghost
plot: The journey of some of Power's most controversial characters.

title: Carrie
plot: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

title: The Exorcist
plot: Follows three priests dealing with cases of a demonic presence targeting a family and a foster home.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

title: The Truffle Hunters
plot: Deep in the forests of Piedmont, Italy, a handful of men, seventy or eighty years young, hunt for the rare and expensive white Alba truffle-which to date has resisted all of modern science's efforts at cultivation.

title: 27 Dresses
plot: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

title: The Tomorrow War
plot: A man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront his past.

title: Lone Survivor
plot: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.

title: Gretel & Hansel
plot: A long time ago in a distant fairy tale countryside, a young girl leads her little brother into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

title: Tell Me a Story
plot: An anthology series featuring beloved fairy tales interweaving into a subversive tale of love, loss, greed, revenge and murder.

title: Tehran
plot: A Mossad agent embarks on her first mission as a computer hacker in her home town of Tehran.

title: Peter Pan
plot: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

title: The Judge
plot: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth and, along the way, reconnects with his estranged family.

title: In the Shadow of the Moon
plot: A Philadelphia police officer struggles with a lifelong obsession to track down a mysterious serial killer whose crimes defy explanation.

title: Salt
plot: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

title: The Punisher
plot: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

title: Dangerous Davies: The Last Detective
plot: When D. C. Dangerous Davies, not held in high regard by his superiors, is assigned to find a notorious criminal kingpin, he uncovers the details of 15 year old cold case.

title: Shallow Hal
plot: A shallow man falls in love with a 300-pound woman because of her inner beauty.

title: Sex and the City
plot: A New York City writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

title: The Mummy Returns
plot: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

title: Pinocchio
plot: Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits.

title: The Sum of All Fears
plot: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.

title: The Life Ahead
plot: In seaside Italy, a Holocaust survivor with a daycare business takes in a 12-year-old street kid who recently robbed her.

title: Northern Exposure
plot: A newly graduated doctor is required to set up his practice in an eccentric Alaskan town.

title: Snowden
plot: The NSA's illegal surveillance techniques are leaked to the public by one of the agency's employees,  Edward Snowden , in the form of thousands of classified documents distributed to the press.
